title: 469.1812 DEFINITIONS.
text:
For purposes of sections 469.1812 to 469.1815, the following terms have the meanings given.
"Governing body" means, for a city, the city council; for a school district, the school board; for a county, the county board; and for a town, the board of supervisors.
"Municipality" means a statutory or home rule charter city or a town.
"Political subdivision" or "subdivision" means a statutory or home rule charter city, town, school district, or county.
